Reviews.Author: Zack m
Reviews.Content: Good little starter tablet.  It may be off brand but does still run android as its operating system. Kind of hard to see the screen when you hold it vertically but other then that it's great
Reviews.Title: Good starter tablet

Reviews.Author: Wilda Rijo
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent good services, is fast my doughter love it, is a perfect present, the app's are really good.
Reviews.Title: Excellent Product

Reviews.Author: Sutton
Reviews.Content: This tablet is so versatile and it has hdmi. I don't have cable so being able to hook my tablet to my tv is a plus..
Reviews.Title: great tablet

Reviews.Author: Shikira Robison
Reviews.Content: Used not even a whole week and it shut off and never came back on!!!!! Even had it on the charger a whole day and nothing!!7
Reviews.Title: Waste of time and money

Reviews.Author: Ferdie4
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet for granddaughter's birthday. After charging it her mother tried to set it up. Didn't get far so called customer support. She had to reset it about 4 times before it responded. It still was not responsive to touch and took 2-3 times trying different ways to touch it before it would respond. Then it was very slow. She got very frustrated. I took my Kindle Fire for her to try and it was great. She got it registered, games downloaded and parental controls set in a short time. I ordered another Kindle for myself and returned the Zeki Tablet the next day. I do not recommend it.
Reviews.Title: Very poor quality
